tabs.tab_content:
• Aramid high tenacity FR thread
  • All metal thermally protected from the skin
  • Bar-tacked at all stress points
  • Protective shirt collar
  • Heavy duty brass zipper on aramid tape
  • #5 Brass Fire-resistant Zipper Y teeth two Way C/E With Butterfly Bottom Stopper
  • Storm guard over front zipper with snaps closure
  • Action back for mobility
  • Side elasticized waist
  • Separate arm cuffs with snaps closures
  • Velcro on bottom
• 6 pocket design with 1 aramid mesh pocket

• CAN/CGSB 155.22-2014
  • UL Certified for CAN/CGSB 155.20-2000
  • CSA Z462-2015
  • CSA Z96-09
  • NFPA 1975-2014
  • NFPA 70E-2015
  • UL Certified for NFPA 2112-2012
  • ASTM F1506-02a
  • EN ISO11611 / 11612 / 14116:2008
  • AS/NZ 4399
  • OSHA 29 CFR1910.269
  • OEKO-TEX Standard 100
